subject: oracle driver err
msgSnippet: hi -i have installed oracle server -started the oracle listener, and configured it (i ve tested it and it says it is ok) -i have changed the classpath and the
messageBody:
hi
-i have installed oracle server
-started the oracle listener, and configured it (i've tested it and
it says it is ok)
-i have changed the classpath and the path as written in the readme
of the jdbc

stil i get the err message when i compile a simple thin application:
"
--------------------Configuration: java - JDK version 1.3.0_02
<Default>--------------------
D:\programe\java\Employee.java:14: cannot resolve symbol
symbol : class OracleDriver
location: package driver
DriverManager.registerDriver(new oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver
());
^
1 error
"

can anybody tell me what i do wrong??
regards
Vlad
